name: Cyber Fraud Detection
description: Training in digital financial crime investigations and online fraud prevention.

cards.title: Digital Payment Fraud & Identity Theft
cards.description: Identifying and preventing fraudulent financial transactions online.
cards.summaryText: Uncover digital payment fraud by spotting anomalous transaction patterns, tracing crypto laundering paths, and deploying AI defenses before accounts are drained.

cards.title: Dark Web Financial Crime Investigations
cards.description: Investigating illegal financial activities on encrypted online marketplaces.
bulletpoints: Analyze blockchain transactions for illicit activity
Use OSINT to track dark web financial fraud
Understand money laundering techniques in cybercrime
cards.summaryText: Pursue dark web fraud rings by correlating blockchain trails, fusing OSINT leads, and decoding laundering techniques that hide illicit profits online.
